definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to pierce through/to pass through/to be stringed together/string of 1000 cash

sentences.english: Serena is the fourth different Grand Slam Champion on the woman's side this year.
sentences.chinese: 小威是今年女網中的第四個單站大滿貫冠軍。

sentences.english: Wimbledon is the only Grand Slam to still be played on grass.
sentences.chinese: 溫布爾登是唯一的草地大滿貫。

sentences.english: Steffi Graf concluded her Grand Slam tennis season by winning Olympic gold.
sentences.chinese: 格拉芙以一枚奧運金牌結束了自己大滿貫的網球賽季。

sentences.english: Robinson was 28 when he arrived in the majors.
sentences.chinese: 羅賓森參加大滿貫賽時已經28歲了。

sentences.english: Czech teen Vaidisova is looking for her first Grand Slam title.
sentences.chinese: 捷克小將瓦娃在期待她的第一個大滿貫。

sentences.english: How do you get your gear ready for a two-week Grand Slam?
sentences.chinese: 你對兩個星期的大滿貫比賽準備得如何？

sentences.english: It already has Major Championships and successful golf tours all around the world.
sentences.chinese: 它已經在世界各地成功舉辦大滿貫賽和高爾夫巡迴賽。

sentences.english: At continued last China can avowal of a tennis player in a Grand Slam final.
sentences.chinese: 中國終於能夠在網球大滿貫賽上揚眉吐氣了。

sentences.english: Zheng Jie yesterday became the first Chinese singles player to get through to the semi-final of a major tennis competition.
sentences.chinese: 昨天鄭潔成爲了第一位晉級大滿貫半決賽的中國選手。

sentences.english: Li is the newly-crowned first-ever Chinese Grand Slam tournament winner.
sentences.chinese: 李娜是第一位新加冕的中國大滿貫錦標賽冠軍。

sentences.english: But he still can't get over the hump.
sentences.chinese: 但他仍然不能碰到他第一個大滿貫的邊。

sentences.english: We've never played in a huge match like in the semis of a Grand Slam or even the semis of a tournament.
sentences.chinese: 但我們從來也沒有在大滿貫賽事的半決賽中相遇過。

sentences.english: They say ”Now you are champion of Grand Slam.
sentences.chinese: 他們說“現在你是大滿貫冠軍”。

sentences.english: All she's going to hear before her opening-round matches are "can you win a Slam?
sentences.chinese: 在開賽前她被問到的問題都是“你能贏得大滿貫嗎？”

sentences.english: Q. Kim's coach once promised toshave his hair if she won a Grand Slam.
sentences.chinese: 小克的教練承諾說當小克贏得一個大滿貫後就剃光頭。

sentences.english: Stella Artois is one of the brands owned by InBev.
sentences.chinese: 斯特拉大滿貫是一個品牌所擁有的啤酒。

definition: Grammy Award (US prize for music recording)/also written 格萊美獎|格莱美奖
to monopolize/to take on responsibility over everything/to undertake the whole task
to win every trick in a card game/grand slam/fig. total success
to snatch gold/to take first place in a competition
Grammy Award (US prize for music recording)/also written 葛萊美獎|葛莱美奖
